//For Loop Example

package program;

public class forloopExm {

	public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception{
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		for(int i=1;i<=5;i++){  
			for(int j=1;j<=i;j++){  
			        System.out.print("* ");  
			}  
			System.out.println();
	}

}
}

//OutPut

* 
* * 
* * * 
* * * * 
* * * * *
